Package ohos.sysappcomponents.settings

Class SystemSettings.Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.settings.SystemSettings.Date
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemSettings

    public static class SystemSettings.Date
extends Object
    Provides methods for setting time and date formats.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String AUTO_GAIN_TIME
      Specifies whether the date, time, and time zone are automatically obtained from the Network Identity and Time Zone (NITZ).
      static String AUTO_GAIN_TIME_ZONE
      Specifies whether the time zone is automatically obtained from NITZ.
      static String DATE_FORMAT
      Indicates the date format.
      static String TIME_FORMAT
      Specifies whether the time is displayed in 12-hour or 24-hour format.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • AUTO_GAIN_TIME

        public static final String AUTO_GAIN_TIME
        Specifies whether the date, time, and time zone are automatically obtained from the Network Identity and Time Zone (NITZ).

        If the value is true, the information is automatically obtained from NITZ. If the value is false, the information is not obtained from NITZ.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTO_GAIN_TIME_ZONE

        public static final String AUTO_GAIN_TIME_ZONE
        Specifies whether the time zone is automatically obtained from NITZ.

        If the value is true, the information is automatically obtained from NITZ. If the value is false, the information is not obtained from NITZ.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATE_FORMAT

        public static final String DATE_FORMAT
        Indicates the date format.

        The formats mm/dd/yyyy, dd/mm/yyyy, and yyyy/mm/dd are available.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TIME_FORMAT

        public static final String TIME_FORMAT
        Specifies whether the time is displayed in 12-hour or 24-hour format.

        If the value is 12, the 12-hour format is used. If the value is 24, the 24-hour format is used.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
